biotools.summary:
A new python tool for differential methylation and hydroxymethylation analysis in various DNA methylation sequencing data.

DNA methylation (5mC) and hydroxymethylation (5hmC) are chemical modifications of cytosine bases which play a crucial role in epigenetic gene regulation.

bioschemas.name: HMST-Seq-Analyzer
